Prerequisites: ACG3101(WITH A C OR BETTER) & FIN3403
Course Description: CONTINUATION OF ACG 3XXX (FAR 1) AND INCLUDES COVERAGE OF ACCOUNTING FOR INVESTMENTS, NON-CURRENT LIABILITIES AND EQUITIES, ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES, DERIVATIVES, ACCOUNTING CHANGES, STATEMENT OF CASH FLOWS, AND EARNINGS PER SHARE.
Textbook(s):
INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNTING  IFRS INTEGRATED BY SPICELAND, SEPE, AND NELSON, 6TH EDITION,
MCGRAW-HILL IRWIN, 2010 (ALSO USED IN FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING AND REPORTING 1)
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
